name: shoal-salt
short_effect: No effect. Gen III: Trade four and four Shoal Shells for a Shell Bell.

flavor_text.black_white: Pure salt that can be discovered deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Pure salt that can be discovered deep inside the Shoal Cave. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
